title: ‘How’s Your Drink?’ Never Been More Needed, Cheers
sub_head: Eric Felten is an essential worker in these dry times.
body:
Eric Felten has done yeoman’s work in cheering Covid shut-ins who have emptied the liquor larder, sweeping away years of dead spiders in search of anything potable and alcoholic (“Here’s to Simple Pleasures,” Bookshelf, Dec. 26). He is an essential worker in these dry times and I toast his spirit(s).
Paul Bloustein
Cincinnati
